original_title: The Memphis Belle: A Story of a Flying Fortress
overview: This WW2 documentary centers on the crew of the American B-17 Flying Fortress Memphis Belle as it prepares to execute a strategic bombing raid on Nazi submarine pens in Wilhelmshaven, Germany.

production_companies.name: First Motion Pictures Unit US Army Air Forces

tagline: Fly and Fight with the Crew on an Actual Bombing Mission Over Germany!
title: The Memphis Belle: A Story of a Flying Fortress
